None | 2025-04-18 | MINUTE ORDER: Defendants' opposition filing to Plaintiffs' 6 Motion for Preliminary Injunction is due on April 30, 2025. Plaintiffs' reply, if any, is due on May 6, 2025. The parties are further ORDERED to appear for an in-person Motion Hearing before Judge Trevor N. McFadden on May 9, 2025, at 10:00 AM in Courtroom 2. SO ORDERED. Signed by Judge Trevor N.
